sen.j: 川島 勝司（かわしまかつじ、生年不詳 - 慶応2年（1866年））は新選組調役監察方。
sen.e: Katsuji KAWASHIMA (year of birth unknown-1866) was a shirabeyaku ken kansatsu (investigator and inspector) of Shinsengumi (special police who guarded Kyoto during the end of Tokugawa Shogunate).

sen.j: 池田屋事件で土方歳三の隊に加わり17両をもらっている。
sen.e: In the Ikedaya Incident, he joined Toshizo HIJIKATA's squad and won a reward of 17 ryos.

sen.e: Later he was appointed as a corporal but dismissed on the ground that he was a chicken and was discharged from the special police.

sen.j: しかしその後、生活に困った川島は、大坂で新選組の名を偽り金策してしまう。
sen.e: After that, having difficulty in making a living, he borrowed money in Osaka under the name of Shinsengumi.

sen.e: It is said that because of this cheating, his head was shaved in skinhead, and he was savagely murdered by Yahei TOYAMA and others.
